title: 1000th Win Celebration!
body: Hi! I just recently hit 1000 wins, and I'm hoping for any rioter to play a game with me to celebrate this achievement. Thank you (:

replies.body: Sorry Bark, I thought I would get an email notification if someone replied to me.. now that I actually  checked; MY BAD, are you still up for a game Bark?
I sent a request just now
WAIT RIOT PLAYS WITH YOU AT 1000 WINS??????????????????
Hi where can we even still see that? the won/lost counter in the post-game-lobby is gone since the client was update :o
